text: Her is on sio swutelung hu Ælfhelm his are & his æhta geuadod hæfð for Gode & for wurulde.
Þæt is þonne ærest his hlaforde an hund mancosa goldes & twa swurd & feorwer scyldas & feower speru & feower hors, twa gerædode, twa ungerædode.
& he gean for his sawle þæs landes æt Wrættincge into sancte Æþeldryðe buton þam twam hydon þe Æþelric hæfð.
& ic gean þæs landes æt Brycandune into sancte Petre to Westmenstre buton ic wylle þæt man mæste minum wiue twa hund swyna þænne þær mæsten sy þider hire leouest sy.
& ic gean Ælfgare minum suna þæs landes æt Hwipstede & þæs æt Wealtune his dæg & æfter his dæge ga hyt for uncra begra sawle þider him leouest sy.
& ic cyþe hwæt ic minum wiue to morgengyue sealde, þæt is Beadewan & Burgestede & Strætford & þa þreo hyda æt Heanhealan.
& ic gef hire þa wyt ærest togædere comon þa twa hyda æt Wilburgeham & æt Hrægenan & þæt þærto lið.

& ic gean hire Carletunes & ic gean hire þæs heauodbotles æt Gyrstlingaþorpe & ealra þara æhta þe þæron standað mid mete & mid mannum buton ic gean Godrice & minre dehter healues þæs landes be wuda & be felda buton þam þe ic minum preoste gean.
& ic gean minum wiue & minre dehter healues þæs landes æt Cunningtune to gedale buton þam feower hydon þe ic Æþelrice & Alfwolde gean & þa healuan hyde þe ic gean Osmære minum cnihte.
& ic gean Ælfmære & his breðer Ælfstane þara twegra landa to gedale æt Hættanlea & æt Pottune buton þam þe ic Osgare gean.
& ic gean Godere þæs þe ic æt Wimunde gebohte.
& ic gean Leofsige Lytlanbyrig æfter minum dæge on þæt gerad þe þæt stande þe wyt beforan þan ealdormen lucan.
& ic gean him & his wiue þæs landes æt Stoctune wið an hund mancosa goldes & ic wylle þæt man selle minum hlaforde þæt gold to minum heregeatum.
& ic gean minum þrym broþron to gedale þæs landes æt Trostingtune buton þam þe ic gean Alfwolde þæs þe Æþelric hæfde.
& ic gean Ælfhelme þære hyde æt Icelingtune & þæs æt Mawyrþe & ic gean Wulfmære þæs þe ic æt Byornham hæfde.
& ic gean minre scæðe for mire sawle into Hramesege, healfe þan abbode & healue þam hirede.
& ic gean minum wiue healues þæs stodes æt Trostingtune & minan geferan healues þe me mid ridað.
& fo min wif to healuan þe on wealde is & min dohter to healuan.
& ic wylle þæt min wif fo æfre to healfan æhtan on ælcon tune fo to lande se þe fo swa hio to forgyuen wæs.
Nu bydde ic þe leof hlaford þæt min cwyde standan mote & þæt þu ne geþauige þæt hine man mid wuo wende.
God is min gewyta, ic wæs þinum fæder swa gehyrsum swa ic fyrmest myhte & fullice hold on mode & on mægene & þe æfre on fullon hyldon hold & on fulre luue, þæs me is god gewyta.
Se man se þe minne cwyde wende buton þu hyt sy, leof, & ic hæbbe geleauan þæt þu nelle, God afyrre hine of his rice buton he þe hraþor ongen wende.
& God & ealle his halgan gehealde æcne þara þe þærto gefyrþryge þæt he standan mote.

Gif hwa æfre ænig þinc of þysum cwyde awende oþþe ætbrede sy him Godes ar & his ece edlean æfre ætbroden & he næfre ne wurþe on his myltse gemet ac he sy amansumod of þam gemanan ealra gecorenra Cristes heapa, ge nu ge on ecnysse, buton he þe hrædlicor þæt forlæte & on riht eac eft gewende.
